name: Puneet Singh
title: A seasoned Product & Tech leader
tagline: Building products that scale, and strategies that ship.
summary: B.Tech from IIT Roorkee and MBA from IIM Lucknow. Background includes shaping product direction in cloud, AI and blockchain, plus leading teams shipping platform products with scale in mind.
bio: I've spent close to 2 decades at the intersection of technology and business, transforming complex technical challenges into products that create real value.
My journey from engineering at IIT Roorkee to business strategy at IIM Lucknow gave me a unique lens—one that sees both the code and the customer.
I believe great products emerge from deep user empathy, rigorous prioritization, and teams empowered to do their best work.
personalNote: When I'm not building products, you'll find me tinkering with emerging technologies, writing about product strategy, and speaking at conferences. I believe in continuous learning and sharing knowledge with the community.
funFact: Managed Products in 3 countries, used by 10M+ users
